FuncDef: The display adaptive-routing notification statistics command displays the statistics on ARN messages for congestion and congestion relief notification sent and received on an interface where adaptive routing is enabled. The display adaptive-routing notification statistics command displays the statistics on ARN messages for congestion and congestion relief notification sent and received on an interface where adaptive routing is enabled. This command is supported only on the CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P and CE8850-HAM.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an interface.
-

Specifies the interface type and interface number.
